notifications.title: ThingConnect Pulse v1.2.0 Released
notifications.message: New features include enhanced monitoring capabilities, improved dashboard, and performance optimizations. This release brings significant improvements to the user experience.

notifications.title: Critical Security Update Required
notifications.message: A critical security vulnerability has been discovered in older versions. Please update to the latest version immediately to ensure your system remains secure.

notifications.title: Scheduled Maintenance Window
notifications.message: Our notification service will undergo maintenance on January 25th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM UTC. Some features may be temporarily unavailable.

notifications.title: Pro Tip: Monitoring Best Practices
notifications.message: Did you know you can configure custom check intervals for different endpoint types? Visit the configuration page to optimize your monitoring setup.

notifications.title: New Dashboard Features
notifications.message: Explore the new dashboard widgets and customization options available in the latest update.

notifications.title: API Deprecation Notice
notifications.message: The legacy API endpoints will be deprecated in v2.0.0. Please update your integrations to use the new API structure.

notifications.title: Join Our Community
notifications.message: Connect with other ThingConnect Pulse users, get help, and share your experiences in our Discord community.

notifications.title: Emergency Hotfix Available
notifications.message: A critical issue affecting monitoring accuracy has been fixed. This hotfix resolves connectivity issues with certain network devices.

notifications.title: Help Shape the Future
notifications.message: Your feedback matters! Take our 5-minute survey to help us prioritize new features and improvements for ThingConnect Pulse.

notifications.title: Beta Testing Program
notifications.message: Be the first to try new features! Join our beta testing program to get early access to upcoming releases and help us improve the product.

notifications.title: Free Training Webinar
notifications.message: Learn advanced monitoring techniques and best practices in our upcoming webinar on February 15th at 2 PM UTC.

notifications.title: Database Migration Required
notifications.message: A database migration is required for the next update. Please ensure you have a backup before upgrading to v1.3.0.

notifications.title: Performance Optimization Tips
notifications.message: Monitoring large networks? Check out our performance optimization guide to ensure smooth operation with hundreds of endpoints.

notifications.title: This Should Not Appear
notifications.message: This notification has expired and should not be visible in the UI.

notifications.title: Future Notification
notifications.message: This notification is set for the future and should not appear yet.

notifications.title: Simple Maintenance Notice
notifications.message: This is a notification without action buttons. It provides information only.
